title: PR Review

common.name: Name
common.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close without saving?

pr.title: PR Review
pr.loadingPleaseWait: Please wait while we load your dataâ€¦
pr.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to access this page
pr.notAuthorizedDescription: This application is restricted to Buk team members only. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.
pr.unauthorized: Unauthorized access. Please contact your administrator.
pr.autoSkipDescription: Since you're the next in line, the PR will be assigned to {nextReviewer} instead. Your count won't be incremented.
pr.autoSkipDescriptionNoNext: Since you're the next reviewer, the assignment will skip you. However, there are no other available reviewers at the moment.

tags.title: Tags
tags.noTags: No tags found. Create your first tag to get started.
tags.removeTagConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this tag? It will be removed from all reviewers.
tags.manageDescription: Create and manage tags for tag-based PR assignments.
tags.manageExistingDescription: Manage existing tags and assign them to reviewers
tags.noAvailableReviewers: No available reviewers for this tag
tags.tagBasedDescription: Select a tag to assign the PR to the next reviewer in that specific area.

reviewer.addDescription: Enter the name and email of the new reviewer to add to the rotation.
reviewer.editDescription: Update the name and email of the reviewer.
reviewer.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from the reviewer list? This action cannot be undone.
reviewer.forceAssignDescription: Select a reviewer to force assign to the next PR, bypassing the normal rotation.
reviewer.skipDescription: Are you sure you want to skip {name}? They will be moved to the end of the rotation.
reviewer.assignmentCount: Assignment count must be a non-negative number
reviewer.countUpdated: The assignment count has been updated successfully
reviewer.countUpdateFailed: Failed to update assignment count. Please try again.
reviewer.updateFailed: Failed to update reviewer. Please try again.

messages.snapshotRestored: The selected snapshot has been successfully restored
messages.selectReviewerError: Please select a reviewer to force assign
messages.forceAssignAbsentWarning: PR assigned to {reviewer} who is currently marked as absent
messages.forceAssignFailed: Failed to force assign PR. Please try again.
messages.trackAssignFailed: Failed to assign PR. Please try again.
messages.assignFailedDescription: Failed to assign PR. Please try again.
messages.reviewerSkippedDescription: {name} was skipped but their counter was incremented
messages.skipFailedDescription: Failed to skip reviewer. Please try again.
messages.statusUpdateFailedDescription: Failed to update reviewer status. Please try again.
messages.resetCountsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all assignment counts to zero?
messages.resetCountsSuccessDescription: All assignment counts have been reset to zero.
messages.skipAbsentFailedDescription: Failed to skip absent reviewer. Please try again.
messages.missingTeam: No team selected. Please pick or create a team first.

team.notFoundDescription: The team {slug} was not found. You can create it now.
team.createDescription: Create a team to start assigning PR reviews. Each team has its own reviewers, tags and history.
team.formDescription: Teams let you keep reviewers, tags, and history separate while sharing the same database.

teamSettings.title: Team Settings
teamSettings.webhookUrlHint: The webhook URL for sending PR assignment notifications to Google Chat. Get this from your Google Chat space settings.
teamSettings.saveFailed: Failed to save team settings. Please try again.

history.title: Assignment History
history.restoreDescription: Select a snapshot to restore the reviewer assignments from a previous state.
history.changesAutoSaved: Changes will be saved automatically as you make them

googleChat.assignmentMessage: {assigner} has assigned you the review of this <{prUrl}|PR>
googleChat.contextUrlHint: Will be shown as 'View Context' button in the message
googleChat.textareaPlaceholder: Base message or generate one with AI
googleChat.confirmHint: Confirm the message before assigning to send it. If you don't confirm we'll use the default template.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Use these keyboard shortcuts to quickly perform common actions
shortcuts.onlyAvailable: Only works when a reviewer is available
shortcuts.globalNote: Keyboard shortcuts work globally when this page is active. Some shortcuts are only available when there's a next reviewer available.

data.refreshFailedDescription: Failed to refresh data from database
data.loadFailedDescription: Failed to load data from database
data.reviewerAddedDescription: {name} has been added to the rotation
data.addReviewerFailedDescription: Failed to add reviewer. Please try again.
data.addReviewerEmptyNameDescription: Please enter a name for the new reviewer
data.addReviewerEmptyEmailDescription: Please enter an email for the new reviewer
data.reviewerRemovedDescription: Reviewer has been removed from the rotation
data.removeReviewerFailedDescription: Failed to remove reviewer. Please try again.
data.assignmentCompletedDescription: {skippedName} was skipped and PR assigned to {assignedName}.
data.skipOperationFailedDescription: Failed to complete the skip operation. Please try again.
data.assignmentUndoneDescription: The last PR assignment has been undone
data.undoFailedDescription: No assignments to undo or operation failed
data.dataImportedDescription: Reviewer data has been successfully imported
data.importSaveFailedDescription: Failed to save imported data to database
data.importFormatFailedDescription: Failed to import data. Please check the file format.

updates-automatically-every-minute-when-: â€¢ Updates automatically every minute when tab is active

skipConfirmation.message: Hey {nextReviewer}! You'll be skipped (without incrementing your count) and this PR will be assigned to {nextAfterSkip}. Do you confirm?

shortcutConfirm.title: Confirm Shortcut
shortcutConfirm.assignDescription: You triggered Assign PR with the keyboard.
shortcutConfirm.skipDescription: You triggered Skip Reviewer with the keyboard.
shortcutConfirm.undoDescription: You triggered Undo Last Assignment with the keyboard.
shortcutConfirm.assignDetail: This will assign the PR to {nextReviewer}.
shortcutConfirm.skipDetail: This will move {currentReviewer} to the end and assign the PR to {nextAfterSkip}.
shortcutConfirm.undoDetail: This will undo the last assignment (from {lastAssignedFrom} to {lastAssignedTo}).
shortcutConfirm.confirmHint: Press Y to confirm or N to cancel.

absent.greetingSelf: Hey {name}! Let your team know when you'll be back.
absent.greetingOther: You're marking {name} as absent. When will they be back?
absent.optionalReturnInfo: Specifying a return date/time is optional but helps your team plan.
absent.markedAvailableDescription: Your status has been updated to available

events.createDescription: Schedule a new event and invite your team to participate.
events.title: Title
events.titleRequired: Please enter a title for the event
events.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe what this event is aboutâ€¦
events.dateRequired: Please select a date for the event
events.chileTimePreview: ðŸ‡¨ðŸ‡± In Chile it will be {time}
events.createdDescription: Your event has been scheduled successfully
events.createFailed: Failed to create event. Please try again.
events.alreadyJoined: You are already participating in this event
events.joinFailed: Failed to join event. Please try again.
events.leaveFailed: Failed to leave event. Please try again.
events.cancelFailed: Failed to cancel event. Please try again.
events.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to join events
events.signInToJoin: Please sign in to join this event
events.notFoundDescription: This event does not exist or has been deleted
events.eventNoLongerActive: This event is no longer active
events.participantAddedDescription: {name} has been added to the event
events.addParticipantFailed: Failed to add participant. Please try again.
events.completedDescription: The event has been marked as completed
events.completeFailed: Failed to complete event. Please try again.

notifications.title: Push Notifications
notifications.receiveAlerts: You will receive notifications for PRs and events
notifications.label: Notifications

announcements.classicViewDeprecation: Classic View is being deprecated soon and the Compact View will become the only available view. You can try it now in Options > Compact View.
